snippet: Syrian military helicopters dropped barrel bombs on a rebel-held neighborhood in the northern city of Aleppo on Monday, shearing off the fronts of apartment buildings and killing at least 24 people, activists said.
abstract: Syrian military helicopters drop barrel bombs on rebel-held neighborhood in Aleppo, killing at least 24 people.
lead_paragraph: Syrian military helicopters dropped barrel bombs on a rebel-held neighborhood in the northern city of Aleppo on Monday, shearing off the fronts of apartment buildings and killing at least 24 people, activists said.
